column6: Carrick Wealth specialises in wealth and capital management services. The company aims to help its customers preserve, protect and grow their wealth by offering a range of advisory services. Carrick Wealth was established in 2014 and is headquartered in Cape Town, South Africa.
column36: "We believe that the long-term growth projections for Africa, and especially those we have targeted, such as Malawi, are positive. All of them have shown an increase in GDP over the last five to seven years. And combined with the political stability in Malawi over the last 20 years, we believe this growth bodes well for our new office," said Craig Featherby, chief executive officer

column6: Ethiopian Airlines provides passenger and cargo airline services. Its cargo services include handling perishable and valuable goods, horticulture, live animals, human remains, dangerous goods mail. The company was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.

Anhui Foreign Economic Construction primarily engages in the construction activities in China. It also holds franchise prospecting and mining licenses for diamond, gold, emerald, titanium-zirconium, copper, and other mineral resources in various African countries, such as Zimbabwe, Zambia, Mozambique, and the Democratic Republic of Congo, as well as engages in real estate development activities. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Hefei, China.
